children.value: Created with Maya based on the Godel Escher Bach book cover. These were requested by
to talk about research initiatives at the
. FPI stood for Facilitators, Partipants, Institutions. HTI was Human, Technology, Impact.
My initial attempt was for the founders of Cortico's initials as a test (
